Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Stamford Towers boasts multi-functional office and amenity spaces with every advantage built right in. Creativity-optimized floor plates and 27,833-sq.-ft. of full floor availability allow you to create a workspace that’s uniquely your own.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Stamford, meet the workplace that wants for nothing. Designed with co-working and collaboration in mind, Stamford Towers boasts multifunctional office and amenity spaces with every advantage built right in. Creativity-optimized floor plates and 27,833-sq.-ft. of full floor availability allow you to create a workspace that’s uniquely your own.

Amenities Abound – shuttle to the train, building concierge, conference facility, on-site management, cafeteria and dry cleaning

A Backyard Oasis- adjacent to Stamford’s 28-acre Mill River Park, a $60M redevelopment to includes a carousel, skating rink and walking trails.

Shift Your Perspective – step outside to 1055 Washington’s new outdoor public plaza, or admire the sweeping views of downtown from one of our many private balconies

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: A TROPHY ASSET IN THE HEART OF DOWNTOWN STAMFORD

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Immediate proximity to Mill River Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1010 Washington consists of a 122,000 Class-A tower building and 26,000 three-story attached Plaza. The property located in the heart of the Stamford Central Business District, is two blocks to Stamford’s Transportation Center and I-95. It is also 10 minutes from the Merritt Parkway and within walking distance to the Stamford Town Center Mall, Stamford’s restaurant district and Mill River Park.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A Complex in Downtown Stamford

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Conveniently located one mile north of I-95 and 40 miles north of New York City
